talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Argenta$
What, kid?
I don't have time to play with you, so go away.

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard is looking for you, {user_nick}.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
Some silver-haired woman came to their rescue when they were attacked by the Black Knight.
Did you see her, too? That silver-haired swordswoman?

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Talk}
Well... we have no idea if she's an ally or an enemy.
I don't know the specifics, but people say she appeared around the time the Black Knight appeared.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
It was her who gave us the information that the Black Knight will appear at the Forest Sanctuary.
Thanks to that information, I lost half of Calderock Adventurers' Guild. Ehem.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
I don't know anything about her, not even her name. But, since she saved those two at the Forest Sanctuary, she might still be there.
She could be looking for traces of the Black Knight.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, we keep on missing each other.... Ahh...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
Angelica...? Oh, that Sorceress? She said she wanted to see that silver-haired swordswoman again, so she went back to the Forest Sanctuary with Edan.
I think they plan to keep on chasing the Black Knight.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
Did that Angelica take your toy or something?
You could have just stayed at the Calderock Village and you might have met her!
I don't know why you're following her so hard.

$Argenta$
What, kid?
I don't have time to play with you, so go away.

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard is looking for you, {user_nick}.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Refusal}
Hmm. Are you going to follow her into the Forest Sanctuary again?
Since you came back safely last time, I won't stop you from going, but be careful.
Monsters don't care if you're a child or not!

$Argenta$
What is this...?
Am I some kind of an attraction?
So many little girls coming to visit me today.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I saw you in the data! But it's my first time seeing you for real!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Huh? What, you know me?
There aren't any rumors about me, are there?
I hate being annoyed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wait, I have so many things I wanted to ask you, Argenta!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Data? ...I don't know what that is, but don't be annoying and go home.
I'm a busy! Shoo!
(Argenta is trying to shoo you away)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I want to know where the Monolith is.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Yeah yeah, you have so many things to ask me.
But, I don't want to tell you anything, so stop talking and go home...

$Argenta$
.......
(Argenta's face turns scary)
Kid.... Who are you? Where did you hear about that...?

$Argenta$
Future...?
Ha, hard to believe. Even if that's true, why should I tell you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The person that you call as "bastard"… is it Velskud?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Not too long ago, some reckless amateurs tried to fight that bastard and got beaten up.
If you don't want to become like that, you better throw away that useless curiosity.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I know she's a descendant of the Ancients.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Oh...? So, is it true you're from the future? Haha!
A little while ago, some kids came to me and asked about the red-haired girl who was taken by Velskud. Do you know know about her too?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do I have to do to make you tell me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Alright. Like the others, you're also after the girl, right?
You weren't really going to ask about the Monolith, were you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you going to go after Velskud?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
A human shouldn't take interest in that.
If you don't want to help chasing Velskud, just go back.
I don't want to talk to you anymore.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why... why are you fighting him? He is...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Yes, I don't know how you figured out who he is.
But I'm going to break his neck next time.

$Argenta$
Stop talking nonsense and go back when I'm telling you nicely.
If you're so interested in why I'm fighting him, ask him yourself!

<html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Argenta has no intention of speaking with me again. To meet the Black Knight, help from the Adventurers' Guild seems necessary. </FONT>It would be a good idea to ask <FONT color=#7e12d2>Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard where the Black Knight is)</FONT></html>

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Refusal}
Did you meet the silver-haired swordswoman?

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
What are you so disappointed about?
They must have thought it was too dangerous for a young girl to take interest in. Haha.
Oh! And, Edan and Angelica have already left.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard$
I've received reports that the Black Knight has gone to the Sleepers' Temple.
They went to find the Pendant of the Pure, which is needed to enter the temple.
They almost died, but they're still trying this hard to save the Prophet... Such kind-hearted people.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Talk}
They heard about the Pendant of the Pure from Heraldry Scholar Bailey...
If you're interested, why don't you go over and ask him?
I'm not sure if I should give such information to a little girl like you... Hurhur.

$Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Talk}
Hmm, Heraldry Scholar Bailey should know something about the Pendant of the Pure.
Angelica and Edan must have left to find it too.

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey${action:Talk}
What? The Pendant of the Pure?
You're also looking for that?

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
I didn't know a little girl like you was working for the Adventurers' Guild...
(Bailey shakes his head)
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Met Her I
journal.contents:
Talk to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard.

Calderock Village → Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard

journal.title: Met Her II
journal.contents:
Meet the silver-haired swordswoman at the Forest Sanctuary and ask her where the Black Knight and the Prophet went.

Gray Ruins (Sanctuary Entrance) → Forest Sanctuary
journal.destination: Find the silver-haired swordswoman at the Forest Sanctuary
journal.todo_msg: Talk to the silver-haired swordswoman at the Forest Sanctuary.

journal.title: Met Her III
journal.contents:
Argenta seems to be chasing the Black Knight Velscud, but she won't say where he is. Return to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard and ask him where Velskud is.

Calderock Village → Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.todo_msg: Return to Adverturer's Guild Master Deckard.

journal.title: Met Her IV
journal.contents:
Black Knight went to the Sleepers' Temple. But, to enter the temple, you need the Pendant of the Pure. Meet Heraldry Scholar Bailey to get more information.

Calderock Village → Heraldry Scholar Bailey
